review: Dr Sandhya and her team provided an excellent impromptu service, she was thorough and clinical with her assessment and demonstrated her findings to me in a way that i could understand, She had a very warm and friendly manner and spotted and advised things other dentists in the Bandra area and even my home town of London had missed. I would certainly return!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Nida Merchant is an exceptional dentist who takes time to explain procedures thoroughly and address any concern that I may have. I couldn't be more pleased with the level of care and service I've recieved.From the moment I walk in , the atmosphere is welcoming, and the staff is friendly and professional. I appreciate the emphasis on cleanliness and hygiene. Appointments are efficiently scheduled, and I rarely have to wait beyond my scheduled time. In addition to the routine cleanings, I recently had a filling done, and the procedure was virtually painless. Dr. Nida explained each step, ensuring I felt comfortable throughout the process.
Overall, I highly recommend Dr.Nida for high-quality dental care in a friendly and professional environment. I am grateful to have found such a trustworthy and skilled dentist.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words

context: Composite tooth filling,Aesthetic Dentistry,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Zirconia Crowns,Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,
review:
I had come to divine smiles dental care clinic with a broken tooth & multiple cavities. I underwent root canals, crowns, bridges, extractions and multiple fillings. 
I was treated under the most experienced hands of Dr. Nida Merchant & Dr.  Sandhya Biyani. The care and VIP treatment I got will always be remembered. I am truly satisfied and have already recommended them to my family, relative and friends. 
I thank both the doctors and wish them further success in their profession. 
The clinic is so clean and beautifully maintained with excellent lady staff working under them. 
My rating is 9.5/10 as I got back  strong set of teeth and a DIVINE SMILE.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your valuable feedback
